items.request: Can you save the current page as a PDF document and name it 'example' so I can find it easily in the next hour?
Could you grab an LGTM image and share the markdown snippet plus the image URL?
Could you pull the nutrition info for a banana?
Can you take the memory journey 'journey-123' and review the items with me?
How long is it from now until next Sunday at 10:00 AM?
Can you send me a quick clean joke?
Could you greet Alice with a short, formal welcome?
What does 'ambiente' mean? (definitions please)
Tell me a fun random cat fact?
Could you fetch the IBGE country record for code 76 (Brazil)?
What's the live temperature near NYC? (lat 40.7128, lon -74.0060)
Quick math: can you add 100 + 250?
What's my BMI if I'm 175 cm and 70 kg?
Could you download a cleaned transcript (en) for this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ?
Can you list the projects in my workspace?
Is the Lyrical MCP server healthy right now?
Could you show stats about my thoughts in this session?
What’s the weather in Paris right now? (metric units, detailed if possible)
Is July 4, 2025 a holiday in the US?
Please add a :thumbsup: reaction to message 1727661234.000200 in channel C12345678.
What are the departments of the Met Museum?
Can you send a Telegram message saying 'Reminder: Daily check-in started.'?
What's the current temperature in Tokyo, Japan, which is at 35.69° N and 139.77° E?
What's the school meal menu for the next 3 days at my kid's school, 의정부고등학교?
Could you get the forecast for lat 34.0200, lon -118.4900?
Can you suggest some conferences related to python and machine learning that are happening soon, like in the next six months, so I can plan my schedule accordingly?
Can you show me the list of pending commands?
Could you search Hugging Face Spaces for 'diffusers' and show up to 10 results?
Can you geocode 'Tokyo, Japan' for me (coords please)?
Please send an email to my colleague with subject 'Meeting Reminder' and body 'Hello, this is a reminder about our team meeting next week. Please check your schedule'.
Could you show me the API steps to create a Sales Order?
Could you run: echo 'Hello World' and show the output?
What’s the latest commit that touched components/sync/service/data_type_manager.cc?
What are the top 10 trending Python developers on GitHub who have been active over the past week, and could you give me a list of their GitHub usernames?
What’s the live temperature in LA? (34.0522, -118.2437)
Can you give me a list of all banks in Brazil, including their headquarters and operational areas, so I can compare them and choose the right one for my new business to open an account?
Could you cross-check the answer to 'What is overfitting?' with three LLMs?
Please search arXiv for 'Graph Neural Networks' (up to 10 results).
What are the top-rated Italian restaurants in New York City that I can visit within the next 7 days?
Get definitions for the term 'artificial intelligence'.
Could you pull NPM package details for 'react'?
I'd like to see a random Pokémon that's been introduced in the last year. Can you show me which one was chosen?
Here's a picture of a cat sitting on a couch. Can you generate a realistic image URL that shows a similar scene - a cat on a couch, preferably with a sunset in the background?
What’s the current temperature around 37.7749, -122.4194 (SF)?
Could you analyze this selfie (https://example.com/selfie.jpg) and tell me what you see?
Can you multiply 4 by 3 for me?
Could you pull the danmaku for Bilibili video BV1xx411c7mD?
Anything I should know about using Hugeicons with React?
What time is it right now in America/New_York?
Could you sketch a flowchart of our user signup, with the key nodes and transitions?
Could you pull the top 5 AI news from the last 30 days and summarize them?
I’m optimizing an iOS project—can you scan '/Users/iosdev/Projects/MyProject' and list all files, including tests, so I can pass them to the optimizer?
Hey, can you check my balance on Binance spot?
Could you search Google Scholar for 'transformer interpretability' and give me up to 10 hits?

Can you help me create a clustered index on the 'employee_id' and 'last_name' columns in the 'employees' table, within the 'hr' schema of the 'mssql_server' database, so that employee records can be uniquely identified by 'employee_id' and 'last_name' for the next 3 months?
Do you know which geologic time interval matches ~66 million years?

some help planning a quick trip to visit the top 5 beaches in Florida within the next 7 days. Can you suggest the top beaches, consider the weather forecast, and recommend the closest ones to Miami, Tampa, and Jacksonville, including any local events, natural attractions, and transportation options?
Could you grab a quick screenshot of the current page and call it 'current-page'?
Can you create a trigger for me on the orders table?
Quick math: can you add 123.45 and 678.90 for me?
Can you help me figure out how to analyze the relationship between the number of hours of sleep and feeling refreshed in the morning?
I’m working on a RN Skia swipe-to-reveal list item—could you outline a performant approach with steps, techniques, and sample code?
items.target_tool: React Native Skia Animation Thinking Tool:skiaanimationthinking
predictions: Server:React Native Skia Animation Thinking Tool

items.request: Can you help me design a study to test the relationship between time spent playing video games and time spent reading books?
What are the current constituents of the CoinMarketCap 100 Index?
Could you use Atom of Thoughts to break down planning a team-building event—premises, reasoning, hypotheses, verification, and a conclusion?
Can you fetch https://www.weather.gov/ and give me the content in markdown?
Could you find up-to-date docs and examples for 'pandas DataFrame filtering'—ideally some real-world cleaning, transform, and viz cases?
Can you delete the tensor named 'temp_model_output' from memory?
Could you search for images of 'golden retriever' (large only, 10 results, relevance sort)?
Using Desktop Commander: can you send print('hello from DC') to the Python REPL running as PID 1234?
Can you help me prioritize tasks for the next week and figure out which ones can be done with the tools we have?
Could you grab the current global crypto market stats—active/ended ICOs, total volume (BTC/USD), and total market cap (BTC/USD)?

Can you get me the most relevant papers on reinforcement learning that were recently posted to arXiv, starting from the past year, with maybe 20 results at most, in descending order of relevance, so I can check them out?
Mind generating a 1024x1024 photorealistic image of a serene beach at sunset with palm trees?
Please export the full game design as HTML docs.
Could you analyze and rate this prompt’s quality: 'Write a concise email to schedule a team meeting next Tuesday at 10am.'
Can you check the USDT (ERC20) balance for 0xF977814e90dA44bFA03b6295A0616a897441aceC on Ethereum mainnet?
Can you plan a quick 5-day trip with my friend to a nearby city?

Can you help me understand the new compound's properties by drawing an analogy with water's structure and behavior, considering both atomic composition and chemical bonding, so I can make some educated guesses about its performance in various conditions and weigh the usefulness of this analogy?

Can you give me a list of the top 5 most recent internet-connected devices running Apache HTTP Server in the US, along with their geographic distribution, services, and any known vulnerabilities, within the next 30 days?
Could you run a clean on '/Users/iosdev/Projects/MyApp.xcodeproj' (scheme 'MyApp')?
Please search Semantic Scholar for authors related to 'artificial intelligence' and return up to 50.
Can you show me the balance of ad account act_1234567890, and its name, by tomorrow?
Can you rename the 'Marketing Tasks' folder to 'Marketing Archive' (leave statuses as-is)?
Can I get the latest version of 'doc123' from Linear?
Can you plan a 7-day trip for me somewhere with a pleasant, not too hot climate, and find a hotel that's right on or close to the beach, ideally within walking distance?
Could you pull the current Prometheus metrics from the WildFly server on 'wildfly-host:8080'?
Can you fetch https://twitter.com/ and give me the page in markdown?
And if possible, could you also include the trading volume for each day?
Hey, I'm looking for this week's Watchtower study articles, could you get the latest ones from JW.org?
Could you search PubMed for title/abstract keywords ['Parkinson's disease', 'recruiting'] and give me up to 10 results?
Please delete the TCP proxy I created yesterday/today that’s still active, and confirm it’s gone.
Could you show the weather assistant’s friendly greeting message?
Please create a new group called 'Summer Reading List'.
Can I get a list of all my requests with their basic information and a summary of the tasks involved?
In the document, please delete characters 5-15 from paragraph 0.
Can you show me the Velt feature usage analytics for the past month, breaking down the counts of create, read, update, and delete operations for each feature?
Could you provide overall statistics for Parkinson's disease clinical trials?
